name: overlay
description: is extended from Widget and PushPop, and it hide in someplace in normal status. When user needed it, it can appear in viewport with different direction or style. And, `Bottle` will make sure only one overlay widget displayed in the same time.

data-attrs.name: mask
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating Overlay requires mask when showing. If omitted, the default value will be decided by fullPage. When fullPage is false, the default mask will be true.

data-attrs.name: cfg-ol-trans
data-attrs.description: Specify show/hide transition configuration in JSON format.

data-attrs.name: full-page
data-attrs.description: Boolean indicating Overlay requires adjusting width/height to match viewport.
